name: Racoonity Service
description:
Thanks for stopping by!

This tale follows the raccoon Archie and their endeavors to be better at collaborating with all those around them in lots of fun ways.

Collaborate with Archie and collaborate with the inhabitants of this kingdom to make the world a better place! 

This is my first game jam and I had a ton of fun with it! There are no doubt some miscellaneous bugs, you can press 'R' to restart the level.  Additionally, I've included some hints in the settings of each level if you need a nudge in the right direction. If the game is closed all progress with be lost.

A very special thanks to:

  • Stephanie Gibbs
  • Jamie Wilen-Spencer
  • Lee Rector
  • Tommy Stallone
  • Cole Gibbs
  • CraftPix.net
  • Lots of other people!
